{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Aerohive |model=HiveAP 330 |revision=(AH-AP-330-N) |upc=700580841788 |asin=B009RP6FD0 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=Senao |availability=EoL (05/18/2022) |price=1000 |est_release_date=07/2011 |fcc_date=07/11/2011 |fcc_id=WBV-HIVEAP330 |ic_id=7774A-HIVEAP330 |type=access point |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=0.6 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Freescale |cpu1_model=P1020 |cpu1_cspeed=533 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=64 |fla1_brand=Intel |fla1_model=JS28F512M29EWH |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=ProMOS |ram1_model=V59C1G01168QBJ3 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe, USB 2.0 |expansion_minipcie_num=2 |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial=yes,, RJ45 console,, (9600 8N1) |wi1_module=Senao A2HP01 |wi1_module_if=Mini PCIe |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9390 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_module=Senao A5HP01 |wi2_module_if=Mini PCIe |wi2_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=AR9390 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Atheros |eth_chip2_model=AR8035-A |eth_chip3_brand=Atheros |eth_chip3_model=AR8035-A |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=2 |addl_chips=2.4GHz High-Gain Power Amplifier;Silicon Storage Technology;SST12LP15A;;3;,,, USB 2.0 (Hi-Speed) PHY;SMSC;USB3300;;1;,,, Trusted Platform Module;Atmel;AT97SC3204T;;1;,,, 1-Channel Photocoupler;LiteOn;LTV-817;;1;,,, 2A Bus Termination Regulator;Fitipower;FP6137E;;1;,,, 20V P-Channel MOSFET;Analog Power;AM6411P;;1;,,, 30V N-Channel MOSFET;Analog Power;AM4362N;;4;,,, 4.9 to 5.9GHz Power Amplifier IC;Microsemi;LX5530;;3;,,, 2.0 A Schottky Barrier Bridge Rectifier;SeCos;SB210S;;2;,,, 802.3at PoE Interface and DC/DC Controller;TI;TPS23754;;1;,,, Multichannel RS-232 Line Driver;Texas Instruments;MA3232C;;1;,,, 5V Tolerant Low-Voltage Octal Transparent Latch;Fairchild;74LCX373;;2;,,, Frequency Generator for PCIe USB 3.0 API & SATA;Renesas;ICS9FG104E;;1;,,, Programmable Three Channel LED Driver;National Semiconductor;LP5521;;1; |flags=enterprise class |stock_boot=U-Boot;2009.11; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.32; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_user=admin |default_pass=aerohive |oui=E0:1C:41 |oui_eth=E0:1C:41 }} {{TagLine|Aerohive AP330 802.11n Wireless Access Point}} :[http://www.aerohive.com/products/access-points/hiveap-330 Product page] *"7016A044302a" and "v1.20" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :The ''[[Freescale]]'' SoC used in this device is P/N P1020NSE2DFB. :It's also marked w/ "533/677 MHZ", "QQLG1112", and "MALAYSIA". *"7016A044302g" and "v1.20" is silkscreened on the board in the users photos. :The ''[[Freescale]]'' SoC used in this device is P/N P1020NSE2HFB. :It's also marked w/ "800/677 MHZ", "QQTL1307", and "MALAYSIA". *"P/N: 5816A0474000" and "P/N: 5816A0475000" are printed on the stickers on the modules. :"CK77 94V-0" is silkscreened on the wireless modules ([[Senao]] A2HP01/A5HP01). The AP is essentially identical to [[Aerohive HiveAP 350]] besides the antenna configuration :(330 = integral antennas, 350 = external antennas connected via RP-SMA). 
Description || Manufacturer ||    Model    || Serial Number 
Motherboard ||     Senao    || AP330/AP350 || 5816A0443000
RF (2.4GHz) ||     Senao    ||    A2HP01   || 5816A0474000
RF (5GHz)   ||     Senao    ||    A5HP01   || 5816A0475000
;Per the FCC manual / QSG... *The default SSID pattern is '''AH-XXXXXX_ac''' ('''XXXXXX''' being the last three octets :of the wireless interface MAC address [lower case letters]). :The default PSK is specified as '''aerohive'''. *The default login (telnet [''note that the Telnet connection is protected by the WPA2 security :mechanisms.''] / SSH) credentials appear to be admin:aerohive. :The default IP address ''may'' be ''1.1.1.1''. Per '''WiGLE''', this device may use 08:EA:44 and/or 40:18:B1 OUIs. {{WiFiCert|WFA12101|06/26/2013}} ===Reviews=== *[http://www.insearchoftech.com/2012/04/05/inside-wireless-hardware-part-2/ Inside Wireless Hardware on '''InSearchofTech'''] ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Freescale]]'' P1020 Dual-core ''PowerPC'' (@533MHz) *Memory: 256MB (SDRAM) DDR2 *Storage: 64MB NOR Flash *Network: 2x Gigabit Ethernet ports *WiFi: 2x [[Atheros]] AR9390 (3T3R 802.11abgn) *USB: 1x USB 2.0 ports *Power: 12V, 0.625A via barrel or 802.3af via eth0 ===See also=== *[[Cisco Meraki MR24]] • [[Senao]] (5816A0472000) • [http://www.insearchoftech.com/2012/03/25/inside-wireless-hardware-part-1/ Review] ==Images== File:Aerohive HiveAP 330 Top.jpeg|Board Top File:Aerohive HiveAP 330 Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom [[Has images::internal| ]] __NOTOC__
